HotelElement.Name: Hampton Inn New York LaGuardia Airport

Description.Text: Hampton Inn New York Laguardia Airport is a 3 star accommodations, Affordable accommodations, Designed to meet families needs, Great combination for business and pleasure. Location: Conveniently located in East Elmhurst.

Citi Field - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi Adelphi University - 4.9 km / 3 mi Solomon R. Guggenheim Museum - 7.8 km / 4.9 mi Metropolitan Museum of Art - 8 km / 5 mi St. John's University - 8.1 km / 5.1 mi Apollo Theater - 8.2 km / 5.1 mi Central Park - 8.3 km / 5.2 mi Columbia University - 8.9 km / 5.5 mi Chrysler Building - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi Rockefeller Plaza - 9.4 km / 5.8 mi Grand Central Terminal - 9.4 km / 5.8 mi Broadway - 10 km / 6.2 mi Times Square - 10.1 km / 6.3 mi Empire State Building - 10.1 km / 6.3 mi Brooklyn Bridge - 12.8 km / 8 mi

Guestrooms at Hampton Inn New York LaGuardia Airport offer coffee/tea makers. Televisions come with cable/satellite channels and pay movies. High-speed Internet access is provided along with free local calls. Irons/ironing boards are also included. Rollaway beds are also available.

Recreation: Fully equipped fitness center, Indoor swimming pool. Services: 24 hr front desk service, Elevators, Business services available at front desk. Meeting Facilities: Fully equipped business center , Small conference room available.

Directions From La Guardia Airport: Head west on Terminal B toward LaGuardia Road. Slight left at LaGuardia Road. Slight left at Terminal Access Road. Slight right at 102nd Street. At Ditmars Boulevard Square take the 3rd Exit onto Ditmars Boulevard.
Restaurants & Lounges: Onsite restaurant. Guests are offered a complimentary hot and cold buffet breakfast.
